scripts.dep:upgrade:minor: pnpm dlx npm-check-updates -u --target minor && pnpm install && pnpm dedupe
scripts.dep:upgrade:latest: pnpm dlx npm-check-updates -u --target latest && pnpm install && pnpm dedupe
scripts.dep:upgrade:core: pnpm dlx npm-check-updates -u --target latest --filter 'nuxt,@nuxt/*,vue,@vue/*,vite,@vitejs/*' && pnpm install && pnpm dedupe
scripts.dep:validate: pnpm run lint && pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run build
scripts.dep:flow:minor: pnpm run dep:upgrade:minor && pnpm run dep:validate && pnpm run dep:audit
scripts.dep:flow:core: pnpm run dep:upgrade:core && pnpm run dep:validate && pnpm run dep:audit
scripts.dep:flow:latest: pnpm run dep:upgrade:latest && pnpm run dep:validate && pnpm run dep:audit
